Megatron Revived/ Malice:  "Really?  It seems that is a common thing for mi=
nions, they seem to have the need to defect.  Maybe you learned it from sta=
rscream.  So what will you do if you are allowed?  Try and sell us out to u=
nicron?"
Blacknightmare: "Unicron would kill me before let me speak"replied=
 cooly the femme"I'm amazing that he and my formers work-mates hadn't found=
 us"
 Malice:  "Megatron!  WHat are you doing?  Don't give her a hard time.=
  Now will you ask Rodimus if she can come or not?"
Megatron Revived:  "Fin=
e.  Kup, are you still there?"
Kup: "I'm picked your signal Pal"replied the=
 bot "I just catch some un know signatures there... who're with ya? "
Megat=
ron Revived:  "It's just me, malice and his 'lady friend'.  Are you picking=
 up something other than us?"
Kup: "Nope, all it's clear.... nobody it's ar=
ound..."said the Bot"Who's Malice's friend? "
Malice:  "Her name is Blackni=
ghtmare.  She helped release me.  She's a friend."
Kup:"realeased you?? is =
she a Unicron's minion ????" said interested the male
Megatron Revived:  "A=
ppearently, she has no faction insignia.  She wants to come back to base wi=
th Malice.  Can we do that or do we wait for Rodimus?"
Kup: As Security Chi=
ef, Kup was in midle of a dilema, what to do? He can't allowed a former ene=
mie come in and whit out know her intentions, he still remembered the spy t=
hat killed Condor... but in other hand... after thought a while he answered=
 "She may come in Maximal base, but Rodimus should be informed and he may l=
ike speak with her " 
Malice:  "We'll go to the base in a while.  We have b=
usiness to attent to first, then we will return."
 Kup: "Bussines???? what =
bussines???"
Malice:  "Private business, that we need to take care of.  Don=
't worry, we'll be there soon."
Megatron Revived:  "I suppose I'm not Iinvi=
ted.  I guess I will return to base if nothing else."
Blacknightmare: the f=
emme felt in silence, she wasn't sure i would be good idea that MEgagtron c=
omes witht them... an what are the private bussines that Malice speak about=

 Kup: "Al right... just be carefull... according with my computer two mini=
ons are in planet.... altought they are far a way"
 Megatron Revived:  "Alr=
ight then.  I will return to base, I'll see you two later."  Megatron then =
lifted into the air, transformed, and took off for the Maximal base.
 Black=
nightmare: "What'rethat private bussines that we have to take care?"
 Malic=
e:  "giving Hellplague the option of coming with us or staying.  If she sta=
ys, i'll have to transfer control of my ship to her."
BLlacknightmare: "I w=
on't like to leave her alone... we have to convince her to follow us..."sai=
d the femme
Malice:  They started back to the ship, a lot weighing on Malic=
e's mind.  "She may decide to stay.  She's a big femme, she can take care o=
f herself.  Don't worry, I'll try to make things to where we won't ever fig=
ht and maybe visit once in a while."
Blackngithmare: "You heard your friend=
"replied the femme"Unicron's servants are around... what if some of them is=
 Injustice... he would kill mi sister..."
Malice:  "I doubt that.  Hellplag=
ue has many advantages over him, and besides, I doubt unicron would let him=
 out of his sight."
Blacknightmare: "Could be..."said thoughfully the femme=
 "but, he knows that your clone hate us... and that is apowerful motivation=
"
Malice:  "Oh well.  Let's get there and settle things, then go to Maximal=
 base.  I have somethings to settle there.  And if a femme there finds me, =
please, for the love of primus, just act like we're friends, or she will ki=
ll me."  He knew wolfblade had to miss him, and since he was no good at pre=
dicting how she would react, he'd rather reduce the risk and play it safe.
=
Blacknightmare:  "What do YOU MEAN?"said the feme
Malice:  "Well, uh, it's =
kinda hard to explain," Malice said with a nervous chuckle.  If Wolfblade d=
idn't kill, Blacknightmare might.  He must have someone out to get him, bec=
ause they may be close to succeding.
Blacknightmare: "Are you telling me th=
at you... Love other one??? "
 Malice:  "..........maybe.....?"  He tensed =
up, expecting her to hit him before he could explain.
Blacknightmare: The f=
emme slaped him and attempt to run
Malice:  "No!  Wait, let me explain!"  H=
e ran after, and caught up to her.
Blacknightmare: "LET ME BE... YOU TREACH=
ERUS... TWICE TREACHEROUS"said mad the femme
Malice:  "You don't understand=
!  I will try and mend things, but we have to do this delicately!  I don't =
want to hurt you, that was never my intention.  Please listen!"
Blacknightm=
are: "I'm listening"said the femme still annoyed
